about_the_game:
Stellarune is a tactical role-playing video game with rogue-like elements, set in a distant magical world.

Play as Stella, a clod hopper from the countryside who enrolls in Astrea's most prestigious magic school, the High Academi of Perlestaire. Here distinguished Dyce casters learn how to wield the power granted by the Soul Sanctum, the origin of all souls and magic energy. An anomaly has manifested within the depths of the Soul Sanctum and the people of Astrea are suffering because of it. Stella suddenly finds herself torn into the center of the Soul Sanctum and she must learn to master the power of her soul and the way of the Dyh Caster to finally bring salvation to Astrea.

THE WORLD OF STELLARUNE

View your journey through the eyes of an ever-changing shape-shifting Castle that allows you to visit various regions. Go through the fiery fields of Mt Salvo, and take in its smokey air and oriental runic history while being careful not to upset the roaring volcano whose fragile husk is known to house a gilled creature that has slumbered in it's presence basking in the warmth of the lava for thousands of years.

When the dust settles at Mt Salvo, visit the chilly Overglaze and watch its eternal aurora glow through the sun or snow. Its icy waters are so deathly, that even its sea life has evolved and has settled its sights on the skies. Inhabiting schools of whales or jellyfish are a mere common sight to its locals. Due to its frigid winds, many creatures here are the oldest in the world, and Stellarune's past is most well preserved here, Large remnants of the century-long battle between the world's guardians can be found sticking out between its cold glaciated peaks.

In the summer when the Over Glaze ice caps melt, it floods Osomos Pura a bustling jungle city nestled high up in the treetops. Built on the foundations of its ancestors like the bones of a once all-mighty dragon, Osmos is now filled with merchant folk beast folk who co-exist with their rocky inhabitant friends. When the water finally seeps away, its floor teams with new life and new seeds every season, creating both new food variants and mutations of creatures every year.

CHOOSE YOUR PATH

Gain various Magic Spells from 3 classes, Ignis, Tempest, and Aether, and inscribe your own identity into your dice. Different combinations of spells will create and cast unique effects onto your foes and enemies. As you ascend the levels of the Soul Sanctum, gain even more powerful meteor-crushing spells to add to your arsenal, and refine your strategy and gameplay style, while unraveling more of the story with each unique escape attempt.

ANNIHILATE THE CORRUPTED MONSTERS

A cast of corrupted creatures awaits you, waiting for a chance to allow their souls to be freed from the clutches of the Soul Sanctum. Fight against them to restore your memories and experience thousands of unique story events as you learn about what's really at stake in this big, large world.

BUILT FOR REPLAYABILITY

New surprises await each time you delve into the ever-shifting Soul Sanctum, whose guardian bosses will remember you, as for each encounter you carve an impression of yourself into their souls. To prevent yourself from succumbing to the darkness and losing all your dice, utilize the Soul Contract a binding document between you and the Guardians about the strings of fate and time.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core Intel Core i5-3470 (4 * 3200) or equivalent / AMD FX-8350 (4 * 4000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 ( 2048 MB) / Radeon R9 390X (8192 MB)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core Intel Core i5-3470 (4 * 3200) or equivalent / AMD FX-8350 (4 * 4000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 ( 2048 MB) / Radeon R9 390X (8192 MB)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: You've been cast out of the Academi, left to fend for yourself in the Soul Sanctum with nothing but your ambitions, a crumbling rune-inscribed dyh, and a mysterious tower. In this replicate world saturated with stars, it's time to begin your journey into the depths and unravel the Sanctum’s secrets.
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
